attributes.action: i want to make the legal driving age to 15.
attributes.additional_details: personally i think 15 year olds are mature enough and also i think that if they learn how to drive at a young age they will become better drivers in the future and if they fail they can have multiple tries before they reach 18 and will need a car more than before
attributes.background: the current age that you are able to start learning to drive but i think that 15 year olds are able to learn how to drive just as well as 17 year olds and that they would not be immature.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/640011
